firstNightReminder: Show the character tokens of all Minions in play.
name: Exterminator
ability: You start knowing which Minions are in play.
flavor: Don't knock the power of a pest. Persistence and stubbornness can be useful in many situations.

firstNightReminder: Show the hand signal for the number (0, 1, 2, etc.) of Outsiders sat next to an evil player.
name: Customs Officer
ability: You start knowing how many Outsiders are neighbouring evil players. [+1 Outsider]
flavor: Have you filled in th proper forms?

firstNightReminder: Show the 'This is the Demon' card. Point to the Demon.
name: Prophet
ability: You start knowing the Demon. If you are 'mad' that that player is evil or that you are the Prophet, your team loses, even if you are dead.
flavor: A vision that was planted in my brain still remains...

otherNightReminder: Show the hand signal for the number (0, 1, 2, etc.) for the number of players that nominated a player of different alignment today.
name: Messenger
ability: Each night*, you learn how many players nominated a player of different alignment.
flavor: Saying nothing is also saying something.

otherNightReminder: If the Hostess had a private conversation involving an evil player today: The Hostess dies.
name: Hostess
ability: If you were involved in a private conversation with an evil player today, you die tonight.

otherNightReminder: If the Hoarder was executed today: All players marked with the 'Learned' reminder die. Otherwise: Wake the Demon. Point to a player and show their character token. Mark that player with the 'Learned' reminder.
name: Hoarder
ability: Each night, the Demon learns a good player & their character. If you are executed, each of these players dies that night.
flavor: These are my things! I need them!

firstNightReminder: Replace the Acolyte's character token with a not-in-play Minion token and mark it with the 'Is the Acolyte' reminder token (that player is still the good Acolyte). When this Minion would normally act, the relevant choices are made by the Demon.
name: Acolyte
ability: The Demon has a not-in-play Minion ability.

otherNightReminder: If the Hatter is marked with the 'Tea Party Tonight' reminder: Wake the Minion & Demon players. Show them the 'This Character Selected You' info token, then the Hatter token. Each player either shakes their head no or points to another character of the same type as their current character. If a second player would end up with the same character as another player, shake your head no and gesture for them to choose again. Put them to sleep. Remove the 'Tea Party Tonight' reminder. Change each player to the character they chose.
name: Hatter
ability: If you died today or tonight, the Minion & Demon players may choose new Minion & Demon characters to be.

otherNightReminder: If the Plague Doctor is dead: Replace the Plague Doctor's character token with a not-in-play Minion token and mark it with the 'Is the Plague Doctor' reminder token (that player is still the good Plague Doctor). When this Minion would normally act, the relevant choices are made by the Storyteller.
name: Plague Doctor
ability: If you die, the Storyteller gains a not-in-play Minion ability.

firstNightReminder: The Succubus points to a player. Mark that player with the 'Chosen' reminder.
otherNightReminder: The Succubus points to a player. Mark that player with the 'Chosen' reminder. If the previously chosen player is marked with the 'Talked' reminder point to that player and signal decapitation: The Succubus either nods their head yes or shakes their head no. If they nod their head yes: That player dies.
name: Succubus
ability: Each night, choose a player: if you have a private conversation with them tomorrow, you may choose to kill them that night.
flavor: Sometimes you wake up from a dream. Sometimes you wake up in a dream. And sometimes, every once in a while, you wake up in someone else's dream.

otherNightReminder: If no living player was executed today: The Cheesemonger points to player. That player dies.
name: Cheesemonger
ability: Each night*, if no living player was executed today, choose a player: they die.

name: Organ Grinder
ability: All players keep their eyes closed when voting and the vote tally is secret. Votes for you only count if you vote.

firstNightReminder: When the first night has ended, declare that the Vizier is in play, and which player it is.
name: Vizier
ability: All players know who you are. You cannot die during the day. If good voted, you may choose to execute immediately.

firstNightReminder: At the start of the game, if there are any homebrew characters on the character sheet or you are running homebrew rules, declare that the Bootlegger is in play and inform the group of all the homebrew characters and/or rules you are using in this game.
name: Bootlegger
ability: This script has homebrew characters or rules.

name: Djinn
ability: Use the Djinn's special rule. All players know what it is.

reason: Evil doesn't win if more than 1 good player is executed, unless more than 1 good player dies by execution.
